Package Model

Class PowerUp

java.lang.Object
Model.GameObject
Model.MovableObject
Model.Entity
Model.PowerUp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable, Observable
public class PowerUp extends Entity
The PowerUp class represents a collectible item in the game that provides points or other benefits to the player when collected.

    • applyGravity

      public void applyGravity(List<GameObject> others)
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Applies gravity to the entity and checks for collisions with other objects. If the entity hits the ground, it stops falling.
      Overrides:
      applyGravity in class Entity
      Parameters:
      others - a list of other GameObjects for collision detection
